H0.text: Saratoga and Yorktown, USA, are the sites of the defeat of which armies. French

H1.text: Saratoga and Yorktown, USA, are the sites of the defeat of which armies. German

H2.text: Saratoga and Yorktown, USA, are the sites of the defeat of which armies. Spanish

H3.text: Saratoga and Yorktown, USA, are the sites of the defeat of which armies. Britsih

A4.text: The second battle ended with a decisive American victory, and the surrender of the British army there.

A5.text: Finding himself surrounded by a much larger force, he surrendered his entire army to General Gates on October 17.
